main event: A witness in Richmond, Indiana reported seeing two white lights with a flickering orange light between them, which traveled fast and disappeared over the horizon.
interesting points: The lights were described as moving at high speed and changing direction suddenly.
The witness stated the lights were obscured by clouds at times, indicating they were some distance away.
The lights were described as bright and rapidly moving, with a muffled or possible noise.
The object was estimated to be about the size of the full moon.
The object was reported to have moved in a zigzag fashion before disappearing.
sighted object: two white lights with a flickering orange light between them
